name: OSF-ALPHA
description:
This is a project to make an Old School FPS, like Wolfenstein or DOOM
Coming to the browser soon.

Here is the website of the game.
Website:
https://osf-1.jimdosite.com/

CONTROLS:
W- FORWARD
S- BACKWARDS
A- LOOK TO THE LEFT
D- LOOK TO THE RIGHT
Q- SHOOT 
ALT+F4- ESCAPE!!!

|GAME IS IN ALPHA_2|
